about_the_game:
Key Features

  • Asymmetric Multiplayer Horror
    Experience the thrill of survival in a game where players are divided between survivors and a single killer, each with unique objectives and strategies.

  • Dynamic Roles and Objectives
    Play as a member of the Critical Crime Scene Unit, tasked with gathering evidence or securing crime scenes. Host players can choose to become the killer, adding a fresh challenge to each game.

  • Immersive and Atmospheric Environments
    Explore chilling, detailed maps within the eerie Pine Mountain, filled with dark secrets, clues, and hazards that add depth and tension to the gameplay.

  • Randomized Killer Selection
    For added suspense, a killer is randomly chosen each game unless the host chooses the role, keeping players on edge as alliances shift and trust is tested.

  • Strategic Puzzle-Solving and Resource Gathering
    Survivors must find essential items, solve puzzles, and uncover clues to escape while staying one step ahead of the killer.

  • Evolving Storyline
    Discover the hidden history of Pine Mountain and its haunted past, piecing together the mystery one map at a time.

  • Psychological Tension and Jump Scares
    With intense chases, unexpected scares, and dark settings, the game keeps players on high alert, making every encounter nerve-wracking.

  • Host Options for Customization
    Customize your experience as the host by selecting map options, killer preferences, and gameplay tweaks for varied and personalized matches.

  • Designed in Unreal Engine 5
    High-quality visuals and immersive audio bring Pine Mountain’s haunting environments to life, enhancing the horror experience with realistic details.

content_descriptors.notes: Customers should be aware that Escape From Pine Mountain contains mature content that may include intense violence, blood and gore, and themes of horror that can be unsettling. The game may also feature jump scares, depictions of crime scenes, and psychological tension that could be disturbing to some players. It’s intended for a mature audience, so discretion is advised for those sensitive to graphic or frightening content.

short_description: Escape From Pine Mountain is an online asymmetric horror game where players, as members of the Critical Crime Scene Unit, investigate eerie cases in Pine Mountain. Host players can choose to be the killer, adding suspense. Navigate tense environments, solve mysteries, and fight to survive.
